products.title: Mirabella Solar Crush Marble White Solar/thermal Perfect Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Their mirabella collection are made from solar fabric. This means they utilize fabric technology that keeps your room warm in winter and cool in summer by absorbing heat from sunlight. This makes them an excellent choice for those who are looking for energy efficient and energy saving blinds. Featured here in their marble white - a contemporary take on a traditional neutral tone. products.title: Lexington White Thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.
